did.abstract: This is a Senior Essay for the History Dept. at Yale University, April 12, 1993, by Angela Y. Lean.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "San Francisco's 1938 National Dollar Store Strike: An Opportunity for Change," by Angela Y. Lean.
